'''Cold-Blooded Strike''' is [[Kaeya]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* "Every hit" refers to the number of enemies hit. Hitting ''N'' enemies with Frostgnaw will regenerate HP for Kaeya equal to 15%×''N'' of his ATK.
